A. By setting the monitoring category of the Workflow message processing batch job to Workflow, the system will actively track the status of the workflow processing and provide specific monitoring for workflow-related issues.
B. Setting the critical job flag of the Workflow message processing batch job to True indicates that this job is critical and requires special attention. It ensures that any failures or errors in the workflow processing are flagged as critical issues.
C. By setting the Ignore task failure flag of the Workflow message processing batch job to False, any failure in the workflow processing will be treated as an important event and will not be ignored. This allows the support team to take immediate action to resolve the issue.

Selected Answer: ABC
To actively track the status of workflows and quickly resolve any failures, the following steps should be taken:
A. Set the monitoring category of the Workflow message processing batch job to Workflow. This will ensure that the batch job is actively monitored and any issues are immediately reported.
B. Set the critical job flag of the Workflow message processing batch job to True. This will ensure that any failures in the batch job are treated with a high level of urgency.
C. Set the Ignore task failure flag of the Workflow message processing batch job to False. This will ensure that any failures in the batch job are reported, rather than ignored.
D. While setting the batch job to send an email when the status is Error may be helpful, it is not required to actively track the status and quickly resolve any failures.
E. Setting the priority field of the Workflow message processing batch job to 1 may help prioritize the batch job, but it is not required to actively track the status and quickly resolve any failures.

Selected Answer: ABD

questions.question_text:
You are a Dynamics 365 Finance system administrator.
The expense department relies heavily on properly operating workflows. If there is a failure in the workflow, the issue needs to get resolved quickly.
You need to make sure that the system actively tracks the status, so the support team can monitor and take actions against any failures.
What should you do? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

choices.B: Set the critical job flag of the Workflow message processing batch job to True.
choices.D: Set the batch job named Workflow message processing to send an email when the status of the batch job is Error.
choices.A: Set the monitoring category of the Workflow message processing batch job to Workflow.
choices.C: Set the Ignore task failure flag of the Workflow message processing batch job to False.
choices.E: Set the priority field of the Workflow message processing batch job to 1.
